actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death knight makes three Greatsword or Necrotic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 18 (4d6+4) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: Disgraced Rejuvenation
special_abilities.desc: Unless redeemed, a destroyed death knight returns in 1d4 days, regaining all its HP and becoming active again within 10 feet of where it died.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The death knight has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The death knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The death knight is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
